title: Textile, 20th century
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: warp-faced plain weave with stripes of complementary warp patterning
description: Textile panel in predominantly red stripes with green, white and dark brown accents. Narrow stripes patterned by small geometric shapes and human figures.
